title: Cowboys-Bears TNF Recap, What's the future for Jason Garrett now? (Football 12/6)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to the Bears victory over the Cowboys on Thursday Night Football (:30). The guys give credit to Chicago and an improved Mitchell Trubisky, while dissecting another Dallas failure from all angles and evaluating the future of Jason Garrett (yet again). Next, the Pick Six Superfriends discuss if they think Odell Beckham Jr. will be a Brown next season (37;00) before answering 5-star questions from Apple Podcasts (42:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
